description: This file sets up an AI agent with a specific model and tools, downloads an image from a URL, reads the image as bytes, and prompts the agent to analyze the image and provide news related to it.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An AI agent configured with a model and tools to process requests.

classes.name: Image
classes.description: Represents an image object with byte content.

classes.name: Llama
classes.description: A specific language model used by the agent.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: A tool for fetching information from DuckDuckGo.

methods.name: download_image
methods.description: Downloads an image from a URL to a specified output path.

methods.name: agent.print_response
methods.description: Sends a prompt to the agent and outputs the response, including images.
